message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper deals with machine learning methods for corpus correction in the context of machine translation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also uses maximum-entropy method, which is a common machine learning method, so it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper deals with information retrieval and optimization, which could place it in cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
